MAP.COMMENT: Ensure no value 'isCacheEnabled' from previous retries exists in the pipeline

BRANCH.COMMENT: What is the status of the cache?

INVOKE.NAME: $null
INVOKE.COMMENT: I: Cache '%cacheName%' not available yet, waiting for it to come online ...

Values.value: Cache '%cacheName%' not available yet, waiting for it to come online ...

INVOKE.NAME: $default
INVOKE.COMMENT: I: Cache '%cacheName%' has enable status '%isCacheEnabled%', waiting for it to come online ...

Values.value: Cache '%cacheName%' has enable status '%isCacheEnabled%', waiting for it to come online ...
